review: A great addition to our TV viewing.  Tons of movies and great games are available.  Love it.
author: Jimbo

review: As an owner of an Apple TV, the latest and greatest Roku and other devices, I can say this one works the best and is my favorite with one exception: No HBO Go. Its not a deal breaker, but requires us to keep the Roku which does have HBO Go. So, while I love the Fire TV and like it the best, I cannot live without the Roku. Amazon, addHBO Go and I won't be able to live with out the fire. I would then sell my Roku.

review: our family has owned 3 Roku devices and decided to switch to the Amazon Fire TV.  I'm glad we did.  the navigation is a bit different than the roku, but the speed and picture quality is incredible.  Very easy to setup.  I wouldn't recommend this if you had no interest in having an Amazon Prime account.
